p: The analysis is based on the output of 35 Coupled Model Intercomparison Project phase 5 (CMIP5) models (Taylor et al., 2012, see supporting information Table S1 for an overview) using historical simulations and future scenarios under the Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5 (Riahi et al., 2011). The calculations are conducted on each grid point individually, after performing a bilinear interpolation to a common 2.5Â° grid.
